s1.title: Snapshot
s1.p: You might want to see some nice pictures of Cocoon Webmail before installing, and configuring this application.

s2.title: A List of Folders
s2.p: Cocoon Webmail presents a list of available folders; select a folder to list the messages, or list subfolders.

s2.title: A List of Messages
s2.p: Cocoon Webmail presents a list of messages holded by a folder; select a message #id in order to show the content of a mail.

s2.title: Message Content
s2.p: Cocoon Webmail shows the content of a mail.
